mapper.select: SELECT AUTH_SQ, USER_NO, USER_TYPE, MENU_SQ, AUTH_C, AUTH_R, AUTH_U, AUTH_D FROM TB_USER_AUTH WHERE USER_TYPE = (SELECT USER_TYPE FROM TB_USER_INFO WHERE USER_SEQ = CASE(#{USER_NO} as integer));
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_USER_AUTH ( AUTH_SQ,
USER_NO,
USER_TYPE,
USER_GROUP,
MENU_SQ, AUTH_C, AUTH_R, AUTH_U, AUTH_D ) VALUES ( nextval('sq_tb_user_auth'),
cast(#{TYPEVALUE} as integer),
#{TYPEVALUE},
#{TYPEVALUE},
cast(#{menu_sq} as integer), CASE WHEN #{auth_c} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end, CASE WHEN #{auth_r} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end, CASE WHEN #{auth_u} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end, CASE WHEN #{auth_d} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_USER_AUTH WHERE menu_sq = (select menu_sq from tb_menu_info WHERE menu_id = #{menu_id})
mapper.select: SELECT MENU_SQ, CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(AUTH_C as integer)) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AUTH_C, CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(AUTH_R as integer)) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AUTH_R, CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(AUTH_U as integer)) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AUTH_U, CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(AUTH_D as integer)) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AUTH_D FROM TB_USER_AUTH WHERE MENU_SQ = (SELECT MENU_SQ FROM TB_MENU_INFO WHERE MENU_ID = #{MENU_ID}) AND(USER_NO = CAST(#{USER_NO} as integer) OR USER_TYPE = (SELECT USER_TYPE FROM TB_USER_INFO WHERE USER_SEQ = CAST(#{USER_NO} as integer)) OR USER_GROUP IN (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM TB_USER_GROUP WHERE USER_SEQ = CAST(#{USER_NO} as integer)) ) GROUP BY MENU_SQ
